Package com.magnet.android.mms.connection

Provides interfaces and classes for configuring Magnet Mobile Server backend profiles.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionConfigManager.AuthHandler
    Implement this interface to handle the authentication steps for an endpoint.
    ConnectionService
    Contains the Request and Response interfaces used in communication with the backend.
    ConnectionService.Request
    The generic request object that encapsulates headers and payload to be sent out to an endpoint.
    ConnectionService.Response
    The response interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectionConfigManager
    This manager maintains the backend configurations for this application.
    ConnectionConfigManager.ConnectionConfig
    Represents a connection endpoint.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConnectionConfigManager.AuthHandler.Action
    Authentication handler action (return or resend).
    ConnectionConfigManager.AuthHandler.TokenType
    Tokens that are requested by the underlying connection layer when an authentication failure is detected.
    ConnectionConfigManager.ConnectionConfig.ConfigType  
    ConnectionService.AuthResult
    The possible return values for authenticate.
    ConnectionService.Request.Method
    The HTTP request method.
    ConnectionService.Response.Status
